mention.text: the Seoul Olympics last year , the Toronto Star newspaper reported today Dr. Jamie Astaphan , in a telephone interview from the Caribbean island of St. Kitts , said Johnson was depressed last May by a hamstring injury that threatened to end Ben Johnson 's rivalry against Carl Lewis for the 100 meters Olympics gold medal '' Dr. Jamie Astaphan bought stanozolol or somebody bought the Caribbean island of St. Kitts for Ben Johnson 's in Toronto , '' Astaphan told the newspaper But immediately after taking the Caribbean island of St. Kitts Johnson suffered ''
Dr. Jamie Astaphan , in a telephone interview from the Caribbean island of St. Kitts
the Caribbean island of St. Kitts
the Caribbean island of St. Kitts
a medal taken away from Ben Johnson 's when Ben Johnson 's then tested positive for stanozolol use by Olympics officials
no way I can keep a constant check on him
no way I can keep a constant check on him
